A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: From what I gather regarding the negative reactions are people either A) had their own \"head canon\" and expectations of what this movie was going to be and are bitter that character A didn't do XYZ or B) they misunderstood and missed the theme of the movie entirely.  \n\nThe more time has passed since I saw it\, the more I have enjoyed it. Can't wait to see it again.
